name: Wing 6
description:
> *Zommoros has invited you to participate in the very first private tour of the Mystic Forge. Witness the incredible inner workings of the djinn's magical domain, and uncover the dark secret that lurks at its center.*

This is the sixth raid wing and one of the hardest raid wings for training groups currently. There are three encounters:
<:conjuredamalgamate:703930783496405082> **Conjured Amalgamate** - An easy bursty boss which heavily favours power DPS.
<:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos** - A difficult set of two bosses which heavily favours condi DPS.
<:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim** - A difficult boss which requires power DPS.

Please note that power DPS is **required** in this run for <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim** (and much stronger on <:conjuredamalgamate:703930783496405082> **Conjured Amalgamate**). On <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos**, condi is preferred but you can make do with power.

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will be expected to take the **Tank** role. They will be the main tank for <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos** and <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**. Tanking is proximity-based for <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim** and toughness-based for <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos**, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.
- The other healer will be taking the **Off-Tank** role. This means they will tank one of the Largos and the `Matriarch` or `Partiarch` wyvern on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- A DPS will take the **Pull** role. Only <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** DPS builds are qualified to do this. They will be pulling the `Magma Elementals` with focus on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
- Two DPS players will take the **Portal** role. They will be using `Portals` <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**. Only <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** and <:thief:675414199475634211> **Thief** DPS builds are qualified to do this.
- A DPS will take **Kiter** role. They will do the `Kiting` mechanic on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
- Another DPS will take the **Lamp** role. They will be expected to do the first two `Lamp` mechanics alone on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 6 run includes two **Portal**s for double-pyre strat on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**, mutually-exclusive **Kiter** / **Lamp** / **Pull** roles for <:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS** players to pick up, and **Tank** / **Off-Tank** healer special roles.
